summary: Update the Prasad Enterprise site configuration so the primary public URL is changed to https://prasadenterprise-epm.caffeine.xyz/ and update all internal links throughout the app to use the -epm domain (including admin routing), superseding the previous requirement to preserve https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz (no www).
architectural_notes: Email integration removed per user; inquiry submissions must be handled via local storage instead of sending formatted emails.
Google Maps: include embedded iframe for location display plus a separate external 'Get Directions' link that opens Google Maps on web/app.
Logo must use the exact user-uploaded image file ("Prasad Enterprise.png") consistently across the site.
Add per-product-item realistic images sourced from free stock (ensure licensing allows use); integrate into product item UI.
Add a dedicated Gallery page with category-wise browsing, filters, and 3D/hover effects, using images added manually as static assets (no user upload UI).
Gallery item product names and categories should be auto-generated using both detected text and object/material recognition; allow user to request corrections if needed.
Append “(this is a sample image)” as a small-font disclaimer alongside each gallery product name.
Preserve the public site URL name as https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz (no www).

Interactive background direction updated: replace the existing blueprint/industrial InteractiveBackground with a new site-wide 3D floating hardware-items variation (not an additional selectable style).
Blog: add an in-site admin UI for creating/editing posts; posts must support embedded images and categories/tags for SEO/content organization.
known_issues: Site is currently not using the exact user-provided logo; must re-implement logo correctly.

URL requirements conflict: project previously required https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz (no www), but user now requests switching canonical URL + internal links to https://prasadenterprise-epm.caffeine.xyz/; existing config/links may still reference the old domain until updated.

existing_features.title: Create a cohesive, modern industrial-chic visual theme for the entire site using Slate Grey, Deep Orange/Gold accents, and Clean White, with consistent typography, spacing, and component styling across all pages.

Implement site navigation and structure: a header with a professional logo and the brand name "Prasad Enterprise" that is always clickable and routes to the homepage; include smooth transitions between pages.

Build the Homepage with a high-impact hero section showing the exact slogan: "Prasad Enterprise: Building Foundations, Delivering Excellence." and a categorized display of products where each category is a clickable 3D-styled card.

Create Category pages that list the inventory items for each category (at minimum): Bricks (Red Bricks, Brand: Suraj Munna); Steel/Cement (various rod sizes, multiple cement brands/types); Plumbing (pipes, water tanks); Fasteners (nails, screws); Paints (exterior paint, interior paint, primer); Bathroom (water taps, basins, shower heads, general bathroom materials).

Add 3D interactivity: implement 3D hover/tilt (or scale with depth) interactions on product cards and/or product titles using CSS transforms (no external Tilt.js dependency required), plus 3D text effects for main headings.
Implement a dynamic, hardware/blueprint-themed interactive background that subtly reacts to cursor movement without harming readability or performance.

Implement an "Add to Inquiry" system for every product with an "Add to List" button, including quantity management, and provide a persistent inquiry list (e.g., header icon/summary) that users can review.
Implement the inquiry flow bridge: a "Continue to Inquiry" button that navigates to the final lead form and includes the selected products/quantities in the submission payload.

Create the Lead Form with strict validation for mandatory fields Name, Phone Number, and Email Address; include optional Home Address (textarea) and Message (textarea). After successful submit, show the provided success message exactly.

Cancel email sending entirely: do not attempt to send emails from the form. Instead, store inquiry submissions locally in the browser (including timestamp, contact details, address/message, and selected products/quantities) and provide a simple "Submission saved" state as part of the success flow.
Build a Contact page that includes clickable "Call Now" phone numbers and "Email Us" links using tel: and mailto:, and display the operational hours exactly as provided.

Ensure full responsiveness (mobile/tablet/desktop) and optimize for fast loading despite 3D and background effects (e.g., limit heavy animations, prefer CSS transforms, and avoid blocking main thread).

Add and render generated brand/background images as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI (logo in header; blueprint/industrial background texture in the site background).

Replace the current site logo with the user-uploaded image ("Prasad Enterprise.png") and display it consistently across all pages wherever the logo appears (e.g., the sticky header). Ensure the logo renders crisply on light/dark backgrounds and maintains aspect ratio without distortion.

Update site-wide contact details to match the user-provided information and show them on all pages (at minimum in both Header and Footer, and also on the Contact page). Use clickable tel: links for both phone numbers and a clickable mailto: link for the email address. Display the full store address exactly as provided.

On the Contact page, add a "Visit Our Store" section that (A) embeds the provided Google Maps iframe code and (B) includes a "Get Directions" link/button that opens Google Maps app/web for directions to the store when clicked.

Update the site header logo to use the exact user-uploaded image file "Prasad Enterprise.png" (not a generated placeholder), and ensure the correct logo renders consistently wherever the logo appears.

Add one realistic free-stock sample image for every individual product item in the inventory, store the images as static frontend assets, and render each product’s image in the product cards on category pages.

Remove the brand name “TATA steel” (and case variants like “TATA Steel”) everywhere it appears in the website’s product catalog while keeping the related steel products available (do not delete the products; only remove the branding text).
Add a dedicated Gallery page that displays gallery items category-wise, supports filtering by category, and uses the existing 3D/hover interaction styling consistent with product/category cards.
Add navigation access to the Gallery page from the site header and footer so users can reach it easily from any page.

Implement gallery data handling where gallery images are added manually as static project assets (no in-app upload UI), and each gallery item displays an auto-generated product name and an auto-detected category derived from BOTH (A) detected text cues and (B) object/material cues—implemented without using external AI/LLM services; also append the disclaimer “(this is a sample image)” next to each displayed product name in very small font.

Preserve the website URL name exactly as https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz by ensuring the app does not introduce or display any different site URL/domain in code, UI copy, or links intended to represent the site’s primary URL.

Add a fullscreen fixed-position background stock video (brick kiln scene with laborers carrying bricks and loading a tractor) that appears under the Home page content and remains fixed while the user scrolls the Home page.
Configure the Home page background video to autoplay, loop continuously, and play muted (visuals only), with safe fallbacks for browsers/devices that restrict autoplay.

Ensure the existing site-wide InteractiveBackground canvas remains compatible with the new Home page video background by maintaining correct z-index layering (video behind InteractiveBackground and page content, unless otherwise required for readability).

Ensure the Home page fullscreen fixed background video renders and is visibly playing behind the Home page content (brick kiln scene), including fixing any asset-path, missing-static-file, or route-conditional issues that currently prevent the video from appearing.

Fix layering so the Home page background video stays behind the InteractiveBackground canvas and behind all page UI, while remaining visible (i.e., not hidden by page backgrounds or stacking contexts).

Make the Home page background video behavior match the specification: autoplay, loop continuously, muted (visuals only), and include safe fallbacks for browsers/devices that restrict autoplay without breaking the UI.
Remove the fullscreen fixed brick-kiln background video from the Home route (/) so that the Home page background matches the older blueprint/industrial interactive background style instead.

Update the app’s primary site URL configuration to use exactly "https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz/" (no "www") and ensure the application does not display or reference the draft URL "https://significant-blush-1gq-draft.caffeine.xyz/" or the "https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz" variant anywhere in user-facing UI copy, links intended to represent the site’s primary URL, or metadata derived from SITE_CONFIG.

Create an additional site-wide interactive background variation featuring floating 3D-styled hardware items (e.g., nuts, bolts, screws, washers) that subtly reacts to cursor movement. Preserve the existing blueprint/particle interactive background implementation.

Add a site-wide mechanism to use the new 3D floating hardware background as an additional variation (not a replacement), with deterministic selection behavior (e.g., randomly chosen on initial load and kept stable for the session, or a simple config flag).

Ensure the new site-wide 3D floating hardware background variation is performant and non-intrusive: maintain correct layering (behind all UI), avoid capturing pointer events, and respect reduced-motion preferences.

Replace the existing blueprint/industrial canvas background implementation with a new site-wide interactive background featuring floating 3D-styled hardware parts (e.g., nuts, bolts, screws, washers). The new background must replace (not coexist with) the current blueprint tiled image + particle network effect in `frontend/src/components/site/InteractiveBackground.tsx`, while keeping the component name and its usage in `frontend/src/components/site/SiteLayout.tsx` intact so it remains active on all routes.

Implement subtle parallax interaction for the floating hardware parts based on cursor movement (and a safe fallback behavior for touch devices), ensuring the effect is decorative and does not reduce readability of foreground content.

Maintain correct layering and non-intrusive behavior for the new background: it must stay behind all UI, must not capture pointer events, and must be performant. Respect reduced-motion preferences by disabling or significantly simplifying animations when the user has `prefers-reduced-motion: reduce`.

Create a public Blog section in the frontend, including: (1) a blog list page that shows published posts and supports filtering by category/tag, and (2) a blog post detail page for reading a single post with embedded images rendered inline within the post content.
Create a simple in-site Blog Admin UI for authenticated admins to create, edit, publish/unpublish, and delete blog posts, including a content editor that supports adding images inside the post.
Add Blog navigation entry points from the site header and footer so users can reach the Blog from any page.

Update the app’s primary site URL configuration so the canonical public URL is exactly https://prasadenterprise-epm.caffeine.xyz/ (including updating `SITE_CONFIG.url` in `frontend/src/config/site.ts`).

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement industrial-chic visual design (slate grey + deep orange/gold + white), premium transitions, 3D text effects for headings, and 3D hover/tilt interactions on product cards/titles
Create site structure & navigation: header with clickable logo/name to homepage; homepage hero slogan; category cards linking to category pages; contact page with tel: and mailto: links
Build categorized product catalog pages with listed inventory items (bricks, steel/cement, plumbing, fasteners, paints, bathroom)
Implement 'Add to Inquiry' selection list with 'Continue to Inquiry' bridge to final lead form
Implement lead form with strict validation for mandatory fields (Name, Phone, Email) plus Address & Message, and display provided success message after submit
Store inquiry submissions locally (no email sending) including customer details and selected products/quantities
Add business operational hours section/content (Mon–Fri 7–6, Sat 8–6, Sun 10–3 occasionally)
Ensure full responsiveness (mobile/tablet/desktop) and optimize performance for fast loading despite 3D effects
Replace site header/logo across all pages with the provided business logo
Update site-wide contact details: add both phone numbers, email, and full store address on all pages (e.g., header/footer + Contact page)
Add 'Visit our store' section with embedded Google Maps iframe and a 'Get Directions' link/button that opens Google Maps app/web
Add realistic free-stock sample images for every individual product item and display them in product listings/cards
Remove the brand name “TATA steel” wherever it appears; keep the related products but without that branding (unless otherwise specified later)

Add a dedicated Gallery page: category-wise display with filters plus 3D/hover effects; images are added manually as project assets; auto-generate product names (text + object/material cues) and auto-detect categories (text + object/material cues); append a small-font disclaimer “(this is a sample image)” next to each product name
Preserve/keep the website URL name as https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz
Set/preserve the primary public site URL as https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz (no draft URL; no www) by pushing the current draft live
Replace the existing blueprint/industrial InteractiveBackground with a site-wide 3D floating hardware-items interactive background (floating 3D parts)
Add a Blog system for SEO: create a Blog page plus a simple in-site admin UI to create/edit posts, support images inside posts, and support categories/tags
Implement backend persistence for blog posts in the Motoko single-actor canister, including CRUD operations, category/tag fields, and stable storage so posts remain available after upgrades.
Add an admin authorization mechanism using Internet Identity: gate all blog write operations in the backend by checking the caller principal against a configured allowlist of admin principals.
Change the site’s primary public URL to https://prasadenterprise-epm.caffeine.xyz/ and update all internal links across the app to use the -epm domain (including admin link/path usage)

Update all internal links or any hardcoded absolute URLs throughout the frontend to use the https://prasadenterprise-epm.caffeine.xyz/ domain (where absolute URLs are used), and remove/replace any remaining references to the old domains `https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz`, `https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz`, and any draft URLs such as `https://significant-blush-1gq-draft.caffeine.xyz/`.

Ensure the admin area remains reachable on the new domain and that any user-facing guidance or navigation that points to the admin area uses the new domain (domain only; do not change admin paths unless already required elsewhere).
